name: Divine Reflection
description:
DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO ABIDE BY THE LAWS OF REFLECTION?

DIVINE REFLECTION IS AN EXCITING HYPERCASUAL GAME WHERE YOU MUST SAVE THE PLANET BY DESTROYING INVADERS USING CANNONBALLS AND REFLECTIVE BLOCKS!

Be the savior of humanity and destroy invading UFOs before they destroy the planet.

Use your tactics and instincts to place reflective blocks inside the shield and shoot your cannonball onto them to direct your shots. Descend into the divine madness

as the waves and enemies become tougher with each passing minute, only you can save us!

MISSION

Your objective is to destroy the enemy waves as quickly as possible using reflective blocks and cannonballs. Each wave will get harder and will require you

to test your mental ability of placing and adjusting blocks at proper locations and firing at certain angles. Completing the levels in different timeframes will reward

you with different scores, but remember, the sooner the better. You will not have unlimited time so keep and eye on the timer and do not get intimidated by the amount of UFOs.

KEY FEATURES

· Hypercasual action game

· Dual stick touch controls

· Saving system

· Tutorial level and level selection panel

· Vibrant environments
